review: Great valvue.love the product would buy again.
author: Patsy Darnell

review: Sucked!!! I have a HDMI box that connects a sound bar, Apple TV, and this (when I had it) to my Samsung tv.  Apple TV never missed a beat. This stick would not work most of the time.  You get what you pay for. I will say that I did talk to customer service once and they ran me through some testing that helped for a little while. They were very nice and helpful, so Customer Service I liked, product not so much.
author: DCarnahan

review: Nice interface and app availablity compared to chrome .....got kodi and the rest is history......2 thumbs up

review: It is not really good to stream hulu or Netflix. It takes a long time to stream.
author: Elizabeth Romero

review: Would be 5 stars, but the thing likes to lock up while I am watching Netflix and I have to reset it.  That seems to be the only app it happens on though.  Wonder why that is?

review: easier by far than the apps that are installed on the tv

review: Love it better than smart tv app already on my Vizio.  Bought this for my non-smart tv's. Now want to buy another for the smart tv.
